edu.eci.arep.httpserver

Interface HttpServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpServerImpl

    public interface HttpServer
    Interface with basic HttpServer Methods For The App. Author: Daniel Felipe Walteros Trujillo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getImage(String fullPath)
      Search for Static Image Files in the web server, for now only searches PNG.
      OutputStream getOut()
      Returns the Output Stream Of The HTTP Server.
      void getResource(String fullPath)
      Search for Static Resource Files in the web server, for now only searches HTML and JS.
      void getStaticFiles(String endpoint)
      Search for Static Files in the web server, for now only searches HTML,PNG and JS.
      void printErrorMessage(int statusCode, String message, String statusName)
      Outputs A Error Message In The Web Response.
      void setOut(OutputStream out)
      Sets the Output Stream Of The HTTP Server.
      void startServer()
      Initialize the server to accept requests of the network.

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        void startServer()
          throws IOException
        Initialize the server to accept requests of the network.
        Throws:
        IOException - When the port of the application is already occupied.

      • getStaticFiles

        void getStaticFiles(String endpoint)
        Search for Static Files in the web server, for now only searches HTML,PNG and JS.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The Url Path of The File To Search.

      • getResource

        void getResource(String fullPath)
        Search for Static Resource Files in the web server, for now only searches HTML and JS.
        Parameters:
        fullPath - The Url Path of The File To Search.

      • getImage

        void getImage(String fullPath)
        Search for Static Image Files in the web server, for now only searches PNG.
        Parameters:
        fullPath - The Url Path of The File To Search.

      • printErrorMessage

        void printErrorMessage(int statusCode,
                       String message,
                       String statusName)
        Outputs A Error Message In The Web Response.
        Parameters:
        statusCode - The Error HTTP Status Code.
        message - The Error Message (can be HTML).
        statusName - The Name Of The Error.

      • getOut

        OutputStream getOut()
        Returns the Output Stream Of The HTTP Server.
        Returns:
        The Output Stream Of The HTTP Server.

      • setOut

        void setOut(OutputStream out)
        Sets the Output Stream Of The HTTP Server.
        Parameters:
        out - The New Output Stream Of The HTTP Server.
